name: Demon Flux (Oculus Quest)
description:
A game produced for the 2020 Epic MegaJam. 

!!Bug Alert!!: when you beat the big end boss it still says find the end boss rather than game complete. There are 5 character to find and collect.

Created as an exploration of Signed Distance Fields to generate clear graphics that look crisp and clear close up - an important feature for VR games. I'll be working on a more feature rich version in the coming weeks, so please check back soon.

9 year old Toby loved his Demon Flux cards, almost as much as he loved to hear the story of how his people defeated the invading species from planet Flux depicted on the cards. Because you see, it is much more than a game of collecting characters on cards, it is a colourful reminder of the arduous war against the threat of the Demon Flux, bringing death and devastation to the planet and how that battle turned around. 

It's been a long time, but we're not done yet.

Join the fight as Toby imagines adventures in a world made from his Demon Flux cards.
